attacks.name: Trick
attacks.effect: Move a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of either player's Pokémon to another of that player's Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If there is no Pokémon to move the Pokémon Tool card to, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Lock Up
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
